entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. POP 40%
